string.text: %c[255,0,255,0]Savan, where are you? It's been a tough day. We shouldn't have gone down to the laboratory. I knew that... %c[default]
%c[255,0,255,0]Great job, Savan. The elevator is up and running. I'm waiting for you downstairs.%c[default]
%c[255,0,255,0]Go upstairs. I'll be waiting outside the exit. Couldn't wait downstairs - gas got to me. I need some fresh air.%c[default]
%c[255,0,255,0]Savan, can you hear me? Are you still alive? I'm on the lower level, in the control room - there's something on the cameras!%c[default]

%c[255,0,255,0]Savan, there are no Monolith guys left. You took care of them all. All the surveillance cameras are clear. No monsters, no people. I'll try to run through the gas, holding my breath. Follow me. Look for a hole in the floor, that's where we need to go. There are a couple more corridors on different levels. And at the very end, there will be an elevator going up. We need to get out. Don't forget about the documents for Skidan. %c[default]
%c[255,0,255,0]Savan, you found the Digger's shelter. The antidote should be in there.%c[default]
%c[255,255,128,128]Stalker! You are on the territory controlled by the "Duty" faction. Approach slowly to clarify the circumstances! And don't even think about resisting!%c[default]
%c[255,255,128,128]Hey, come over. I've got something to discuss.%c[default]
